overview: Spunk and piss are very much the order of the day, as Vlado Iresch brings together a bunch of cum-obsessed paint-ballers, including Julien Heath, Jacob Bishop and the iconic Kamil Fox. With jizz-sodden facials and double-penetrations galore, and without a single rubber in sight, this is one all-boy, cocked-gun fantasy you won’t want to miss!
title: Bare Bukkake Piss Ballers
